doc.title: GS Industrials Taking Points in Autos/Batteries, Construction
doc.source_uri: 2025-09-02/GS Industrials _ Talking Points in Autos_Batteries, Construction Machinery, and Shipbuilding 高盛工业 _ 汽车 _ 电池、工程机械与造 船业要点_2025-09-02

passages.text: DO NOT MISS: in- person Group Meeting at GS HK office on China Industrials Tech today at 3:30PM HKT (RSVP) / Yokohama Rubber CFO call today at 3:30PM HKT (RSVP) / Please participate in our poll ahead of ALC tomorrow here...
不要错过：今天下午3:30（香港时间）在高盛香港办公室举行的中国工业科技线下小组会议（请回复确认）/横滨橡胶首席财务官电话会议今天下午3:30（香港时间）（请回复确认）/请在明天ALC会议前参与我们的投票，点击此处...
\*Any references to we/us/our refers to the spec sales desk.\*
\*任何提及“我们/我方/我们的”均指销售交易台。\*

USD/JPY up slightly intraday after dovish comments from BOJ' s Depute Chief .. (rate hikes 'if' conditions allow) .. Korea and Japan indices slightly up while China down today with key themes driving the talking points in Asia Industrials. China solid state batteries .. (Lead Intelligent up another +11%) / Korea Shipbuilding (citing US shipbuilding \*oppty again .. "expect big moves on the military side of the ledger soon ..") / Korea Defense (potential military deployment to Ukraine as part of post conflict security guarantees / upside talks in Poland from new Eu defense package, etc.) ..

美元/日元在盘中因日本央行副行长的鸽派言论小幅上涨（加息需视条件允许而定）......韩国和日本股指小幅上涨，而中国今日下跌，亚洲工业板块的关键主题推动了相关讨论。中国固态电池（Lead Intelligent再涨逾11%）/韩国造船（再次提及美国造船机会......“预计很快会在军工领域账面上出现大动作.....”）/韩国防务（作为战后安全保障的一部分，可能向乌克兰进行军事部署/波兰就欧盟新防务计划进行利好谈判等）。

In Shipbuilding, inbounds on Yangzijiang feedback. While there' s strong visibility for margins to expand into 2027 driven by profitable backlog from 2024, (current OPM at \(\sim 30\%\) to \(\sim 38\%\) by 2027E), debate seems to be on whether orders continue to grow given concerns on M/S trends (down in 1H25); bulls are looking at the replacement cycle + stricter decarbonization which would drive order growth from 2029 onwards
/ bears still focused on impact of USTR on company's market share going forward. Thoughts/ Views? ..

在造船领域，收到关于扬子江的反馈。尽管受益于自2024年起的高利润订单积压，利润率有望在2027年前持续提升（当前营业利润率约 \(30\%\) ，预计到2027年可达约 \(38\%\) ），但市场争论的焦点似乎在于，考虑到对市场份额趋势的担忧（2025年上半年下降），订单是否会继续增长；多头看好更新周期 \(^+\) 更严格的脱碳要求将推动2029年起的订单增长/空头则仍关注美国贸易代表署（USTR）对公司未来市场份额的影响。有什么想法/看法？

In Autos, HMC/KIA wholesale sales data for Aug looks resilient - HMC global sales up \(+0.4\%\) YoY (domestic \(+0.4\%\) / overseas \(+0.5\%\) ). Kia global sales \(+0.8\%\) YoY (domestic \(+7.4\%\) /overseas \(- 0.4\%\) ). Eyes on US SAAR data due Thurs ..(COX Automotive estimates \(\sim 16\mathrm{mn}\) .. expecting EV pre- buys ahead of Sept). Quickly flagging Cox Automotive comments on how they think about rate cuts into demand for autos - "Even if the Fed starts cutting in September, what they control is short- term rates and the cost of lending from the Fed and between banks. Mortgage and auto loan rates follow longer- term Treasury yields like the 10- year, which isn't expected to move much in the near term. Auto loan rates are projected to decline gradually as loan performance improves and economic conditions stabilize, with more meaningful relief likely in 2026 or later, rather than in the near term." -> Autos as a sector hasn't really moved post Q2 / US rate cut expectation and market focus is still on the 'tariff impact' = this year earnings .. bull case from here seems to be a shift in focus into next year earnings / HEV story when visibility improves ..

在汽车板块，HMC/KIA8月批发销售数据表现稳健——HMC全球销量同比增长 \(+0.4\%\) （国内 \(+0.4\%\) /海外 \(+0.5\%\) ）。Kia全球销量同比增长 \(+0.8\%\) （国内 \(+7.4\%\) /海外 \(- 0.4\%\) ）。关注将于周四公布的美国SAAR数据......（COX Automotive预计约1600万......预计在9月前会有电动车提前购买）。快速提及CoxAutomotive对利率下调对汽车需求影响的看法——“即使美联储在9月开始降息，他们控制的是短期利率以及美联储与银行之间的借贷成本。房贷和汽车贷款利率则跟随长期国债收益率（如10年期国债），而短期内预计不会有太大变化。随着贷款表现改善和经济状况稳定，汽车贷款利率预计将逐步下降，更显著的缓解可能要到2026年或更晚，而不是短期内。”→汽车板块在二季度/美国降息预期之后并没有明显波动，市场关注点仍在“关税影响”=今年盈利......从现在起的多头逻辑似乎是当可见度提升时，关注点转向明年盈利/混合动力汽车（HEV）故事。
Re- flagging this chart -- GSXAJPAM (GS Japan Autos) vs. TPX ... 重新标注此图表——GSXAJPAM (GS Japan Autos) 对比 TPX ...
Source:BBG as of Sept 2, past performance is not indicative of future results
来源：BBG截至9月2日，过往业绩不代表未来结果

In Batteries, Solid state supply chain in China catching the most inbounds... another 'theme' without much fundamental support?.. "Lead/Hangke received Rmb400- 500mn/50- 100mn FSS battery equipment new orders. Current solid state battery orders are mainly contributed by overseas battery OEMs seeking technology overtake vs. China domestic OEMs. This could be an early start of the lab- to- factory process but the revenue contribution remain tiny in the near- term. Lead has completed a full- line solution delivery for solid state batteries but all other orders for both companies were equipment- only, indicating most battery OEMs have not finalized their solid state technology. (GIR note)"

在电池领域，中国固态电池供应链获得了最多的关注......又一个缺乏太多基本面支撑的“主题”？......“先导/杭可分别获得了4- 5亿元/5000- 1亿元的固态电池设备新订单。目前固态电池订单主要来自希望在技术上超越中国本土厂商的海外电池OEM。这可能是从实验室走向工厂的早期阶段，但在短期内对收入的贡献仍然微乎其微。先导已完成固态电池的全线解决方案交付，但两家公司其他所有订单均为单一设备订单，这表明大多数电池OEM尚未最终确定其固态电池技术。（GIR注）"
Source:BBG as of Sept 2, past performance is not indicative of future results
来源：BBG截至9月2日，过往业绩不代表未来结果

In Construction Machinery, China's HDT domestic wholesale volume \(+50\%\) YoY/ retail volume \(\sim 50\%\) YoY suggesting healthy sell- through. LNG HDT finally turned positive YoY, up \(30\% +\) , with LNG HDT penetration recovered to high- \(20\%\) . This marks the first month of positive yoy growth for LNG HDT sales volume since Feb. Debate on Weichai seems to be less on the profitability outlook going forward (supported by better LNG mix / co mentioned that Aug LNG engine production \(+70\%\) YoY) but on the cycle outlook as LNG penetration looks slower due to faster BEV penetration going forward.

在工程机械领域，中国重卡国内批发量同比增长 \(50\%\) ，零售量同比增长约 \(50\%\) ，显示出良好的终端销售情况。LNG重卡销量终于同比转正，增长超过 \(30\%\) ，LNG重卡渗透率恢复至 \(20\%\) 后段高位。这是自2月以来LNG重卡销量首次实现同比正增长。关于潍柴的讨论似乎不再集中于未来的盈利能力预期（受益于更好的LNG产品结构/公司提到8月LNG发动机产量同比增长 \(70\%\) ），而是集中在周期前景上，因为随着未来BEV渗透率加快，LNG渗透率增长显得较为缓慢。

KR Defense - Hanwha defense companies (Hanwha Aero/Systems/Ocean) announced their participation in the international defense industry exhibition in Poland, starting Sept 2- 5. Hanwha Ocean is said to be taking the lead in the integrated booth to secure the Polish Orca project, approximated to be worth W8tn (c. \(\) 5.8bn\$ by the Polish
government to acquire three new submarines as part of its naval modernization program, for which the street expects the govt to select a preferred bidder within a year.
韩国防务——Hanwha 防务公司（Hanwha Aero/Systems/Ocean）宣布将参加 9 月 2 日至 5 日在波兰举行的国际防务工业展览会。据称，Hanwha Ocean 将在综合展台中担任主导，以争取波兰 Orca 项目。该项目由波兰政府规划采购三艘新型潜艇，作为其海军现代化计划的一部分，估值约 8 万亿韩元（约合 58 亿美元）。市场预计政府将在一年内选定首选投标方。

COSCO Shipping Energy - 1H25 net profit of Rmb1.9bn, implying 2Q25 net profit of Rmb1.2bn (- 17% YoY/+64% QoQ), which slightly beat our expectation. However, the company did not declare any interim dividend, as they are waiting for completion of the proposed A- share private placement in Sep/Oct- 25 (announced in Jan- 25), and said they would resume dividend payment after that (GIR note).
中远海能——2025 年上半年净利润 19 亿元人民币，意味着 2025 年第二季度净利润为 12 亿元人民币（同比下降 17%/环比增长 64%），略高于我们的预期。然而，公司并未宣布任何中期股息，原因是正等待于 2025 年 9 月/10 月完成拟议的 A 股定向增发（于 2025 年 1 月公告），并表示将在此之后恢复派息（GIR 注）。

Hyperstrong (688411. SS): 2Q25 earnings beat on volume, yet margin headwinds likely came stronger than expected; d/g to Neutral on valuationHyperstrong (688411. SS): 2025 年第二季度盈利因销量超预期而优于预期，但利润率压力可能比预期更大；基于估值下调至中性评级

- Hitachi | Sept 18 - 8AM HKT | Register日立 | 9月18日 - 香港时间上午8点 | 注册- Asia Leaders Conference, 3-5 Sept, HK | Details & RSVP: link亚洲领袖大会, 9月3-5日, 香港 | 详情及回复邀请: 链接
